meanings.definition: The quality or state of being creamy.
meanings.sent1: The creaminesses of the dessert made it irresistible.
meanings.sent2: I love the creaminesses of ice cream on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The creaminesses of the mashed potatoes made them dance in my mouth.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a creaminesses that enveloped the audience.
meanings.sent5: The creaminesses of the lotion left my skin feeling soft and smooth.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a smooth, rich texture like cream.
meanings.sent1: The creaminesses of the sauce added depth to the dish.
meanings.sent2: The creaminesses of the milkshake made it a decadent treat.
meanings.sent3: The creaminesses of the blanket made it feel like a hug.
meanings.sent4: The creaminesses of the paint gave the artwork a luxurious feel.
meanings.sent5: The creaminesses of the frosting made the cake look irresistible.
